hints.label: prop-affine-invariance
hints.title: Affine Invariance of Z-Score
hints.content:
1584: :label: prop-affine-invariance
1585: 
1586: The z-score transformation is invariant under global affine transformations of the raw values.
1587: 
1588: **Statement:** Let z_i = (v_i - μ_v) / σ'_v be the z-score of value v_i. Under the affine transformation:
1589: 
1590: $$
1591: v_i \to \tilde{v}_i = a \cdot v_i + b \quad (\text{all } i)
1592: $$
1593: 
1594: the z-score is invariant: $\tilde{z}_i = z_i$.
1595: 
1596: **Proof:**
1597: 
1598: New mean:
1599: 
1600: $$
1601: \tilde{\mu}_v = \frac{1}{N} \sum_i \tilde{v}_i = \frac{1}{N} \sum_i (a v_i + b) = a \mu_v + b
1602: $$
1603: 
1604: New standard deviation:
1605: 
1606: $$
1607: \tilde{\sigma}_v^2 = \frac{1}{N} \sum_i (\tilde{v}_i - \tilde{\mu}_v)^2 = \frac{1}{N} \sum_i (a v_i + b - a\mu_v - b)^2 = a^2 \sigma_v^2
1608: $$
1609: 
1610: Therefore $\tilde{\sigma}'_v = |a| \sigma'_v$ (assuming regularization scales linearly).
1611: 
1612: New z-score:
1613: 
1614: $$
1615: \tilde{z}_i = \frac{\tilde{v}_i - \tilde{\mu}_v}{\tilde{\sigma}'_v} = \frac{(a v_i + b) - (a\mu_v + b)}{|a| \sigma'_v} = \frac{a(v_i - \mu_v)}{|a| \sigma'_v} = \frac{v_i - \mu_v}{\sigma'_v} = z_i
1616: $$
1617: 
1618: (assuming a > 0; if a < 0, sign flips but magnitude preserved).
